entry.title: Live! United Prayer | Pitik sa Pinatik April 24, 2020

media:group.media:title: Live! United Prayer | Pitik sa Pinatik April 24, 2020
media:group.media:description:
These are our LIVE shows: Harana sa Kabuntagon - Weekdays 5:25-6:25 AM and Weekends 4:55-5:55am Let's Pray Pilipinas! - Weekdays at 6:30-7:00 AM and Sundays 6:00-7:00 AM, Replays on Weekdays at 7:00-7:30 PM and Sundays 6:00-7:00 Dynamic Living - Mondays at 6:00-7:00 PM, Replays on Tuesdays at 9:00-10:00 AM Pangutana Pastor - TTH at 5:00-6:00 PM, replays on Wednesday 10:00-11:00 AM and Friday 9:00-10:00 AM Takna sa Pagtuon - Friday 6:00-7:00 PM, replays on Saturdays 7:30-8:30 AM Panimbaya sa Kabuntagon - Saturdays 6:00-7:30 AM replays on 12:30-2:00 PM
You may like our Facebook pages, accordingly: https://www.facebook.com/hopechannelsouthphil https://www.facebook.com/letspraypilipinas https://www.facebook.com/taknasapagtuonhcsp https://www.facebook.com/PangutanaPastor https://www.facebook.com/Panimbayasakabuntagon https://www.facebook.com/Dynamicliving
We would like to extend our gratitude to the Hope Channel Donors whose tremendous support is immeasurable enough to make all these productions possible.
For better quality, please watch in HD!
All rights reserved 2019
